name: fullstack-open-part3
description: a project for part 3 of fullstack open

scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ../../Full-Stack-Open/course-submissions/part2/the-phonebook/ && yarn build && cp -r build ../../../../Full-Stack-Open-Part3/fullstack-open-part3
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m newbuild && git push && npm run deploy

author: Kevin Tian
